testcase.name: The isVulnerable method of the Wizard returns true by default
The toString method of the Warrior returns the correct description of the fighter
The isVulnerable method of the Warrior returns false by default
The damagePoints method of the Warrior returns 10 when target is vulnerable
The damagePoints method of the Wizard returns 12 after a spell has been prepared
The toString method of the Wizard returns the correct description of the fighter
The damagePoints method of the Wizard returns 3 when spell has not been prepared
The prepareSpell method makes the Wizard not vulnerable
The damagePoints method of the Warrior returns 6 when target is not vulnerable
